main event: A civilian Air Force Police officer reported seeing a peculiar aerial object in Sacramento, California, on 15 July 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for only a few seconds,It appeared as a mirror reflecting light and seemed to wobble,The object was traveling faster than any jet aircraft previously observed by the witnesses,The witnessing officer estimated the object's altitude to be twice that of the jets in the area,The direction of travel for the object was northeast.
